chat.title: whole blood
chat.message:
- remove extra versions of each thing with 'whole blood'
- remove labs that won't be a certain places (pro-BNP vs BNP)
- add CPAP
- add High-flow nasal cannula
- ?add intubation module

chat.title: remove duplicates
chat.message: Agree with mwahab - too many testing options (just need BNP, trop I, trop T for centers that have it, lactate, D-dimer, etc ONCE)

chat.title: CXR
chat.message: Chest XR - just write one as portable, the other regular. I find it challenging to read the fine print (took me a minute to figure out how the 1st line is different)
